name: NEON EDGES
description:
In the future, edges fight for their survival, you will soon realize that edges together make stronger polygons. Fight a full fledged war in this line edge 2d Neon cyberpunk 
bullet hell.

Instructions:

Use WASD to move.

Mouse buttons to shoot.

ESC to pause game.

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/TheoryGames2

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

Music by https://inaudio.org/track/almost-evil/
